attributes.action: Lower the legal voting age in the United Kingdom to 16.
attributes.additional_details: Only those who are actually interested will vote as those that are not, simply have no reason to do so! Come and help me to give more power to the future of this country, let's get more say on what happens to us and  the people close to ourselves.
attributes.background: I am a youth member of a political party in the UK. Myself and my friends all follow what is occurring within the political world with a keen eye, however we cannot have any impact on our futures as we are not allowed to vote.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104603

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
